Projects

Practice makes perfect.

(2023 Apr.) DappChef

This is solidity-version leetcode built by SWF Lab. My job was mainly focus on construction and testing of the Reward NFT Contract and problem design in the system. In Addition, I also designed the dashboard which enable instructors to check out students' scores.

Technique Used:
  • Typescript
  • Solidity
  • Hardhat
  • React


(2023 Mar.) Discord GPT Bot

This Chat bot is a product used by Create Intellgens Inc. in their Discord. There are two main function in this project, which are getting answer directly from database and chatting with Chatgpt with a limited reply.

Technique Used:
  • Python
  • Jieba
  • Postgres
  • Discord.py


(2023 Dec.) zkVaxCard

This project is based on a ZKProof protocol -- Semaphore. Users are able to prove their vax record without revealing their own information, which extremely protects people's privacy.

Technique Used:
  • Javascript
  • Solidity
  • Semaphore
  • ZKSNARK
  • React
